languages.text: "Как догорит, велено зону огородить, зачистить и никого дальше платформы не пускать. За ослушание вышибай мозги — взялись за них наконец!"

"As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."
languages.original_text: "Как догорит, велено зону огородить, зачистить и никого дальше платформы не пускать. За ослушание вышибай мозги — взялись за них наконец!"

traits.locale_text: "As soon as it burns down completely, the orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Whoever doesn't comply, bash their brains out. They're getting it this time! At last."

"As soon as it burns down completely, the orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Whoever doesn't comply, bash their brains out. They're getting it this time! At last."

"As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."

languages.text: «En cuanto termine de arder, las órdenes son acordonar la zona, despejarla y no dejar que nadie cruce la plataforma. Al que no obedezca, le abrimos la cabeza. ¡Y esta vez va en serio! Por fin».
languages.original_text: "As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto termine de arder, las órdenes son acordonar la zona, despejarla y no dejar que nadie cruce la plataforma. Al que no obedezca, le abrimos la cabeza. ¡Y esta vez va en serio! Por fin».

languages.text: 「燃え尽き次第、このエリアを封鎖して片付け、プラットフォームは立ち入り禁止にしろとの命令だ。従わない者は脳天をぶち抜かれる。今度こそ、連中は本気だ！ついにな」
languages.original_text: "As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."

traits.locale_text: 「燃え尽き次第、このエリアを封鎖して片付け、プラットフォームは立ち入り禁止にしろとの命令だ。従わない者は脳天をぶち抜かれる。今度こそ、連中は本気だ！ついにな」

languages.text: “上面的命令来了，烧光棚屋之后把这里封锁起来，彻底清理一遍，不允许任何人通过平台。要是有谁敢硬闯，把他们脑浆都揍出来。这次是要对他们动真格了！可算是动手了。”
languages.original_text: "As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."

traits.locale_text: “上面的命令来了，烧光棚屋之后把这里封锁起来，彻底清理一遍，不允许任何人通过平台。要是有谁敢硬闯，把他们脑浆都揍出来。这次是要对他们动真格了！可算是动手了。”

languages.text: "Sobald alles niedergebrannt ist, sollen wir den Bereich abriegeln, räumen und niemanden die Plattform passieren lassen. Wer nicht gehorcht, dem wird der Schädel eingeschlagen. Diesmal zeigen wir es ihnen wirklich! Endlich."
languages.original_text: "As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald alles niedergebrannt ist, sollen wir den Bereich abriegeln, räumen und niemanden die Plattform passieren lassen. Wer nicht gehorcht, dem wird der Schädel eingeschlagen. Diesmal zeigen wir es ihnen wirklich! Endlich."

languages.text: « On a reçu nos ordres : une fois l'incendie éteint, on doit boucler la zone, la nettoyer et interdire l'accès au quai. Quiconque désobéit se fera défoncer le crâne. Si avec ça, les gens comprennent pas... ! Il était temps. »
languages.original_text: "As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."

traits.locale_text: « On a reçu nos ordres : une fois l'incendie éteint, on doit boucler la zone, la nettoyer et interdire l'accès au quai. Quiconque désobéit se fera défoncer le crâne. Si avec ça, les gens comprennent pas... ! Il était temps. »

languages.text: "Yandığı gibi bölgeyi güvenlik çemberine alıp temizleme ve kimsenin platformu geçmesine müsaade etmeme talimatı aldık. İtaat etmeyen olursa beyninin pekmezini bir güzel akıtacağız. Bu sefer hak ettiklerini gerçekten bulacaklar. Sonunda..."
languages.original_text: "As soon as it burns down, orders are to cordon off the area, clear it, and let no one past the platform. Anyone who doesn't comply gets their brains bashed in. They're really going to get it this time! At last."
